item.title: Is Beyond Meat a Buy After Meme Stock Surge? Analysts Say No
item.description: Beyond Meat has joined the ranks of the meme stock greats, with short-squeeze induced record volume thrusting the company back into the limelight.

item.title: ABBV Stock: $250 May Be the New Floor After Big Q3 Earnings Beat
item.description: AbbVie beats earnings and raises guidance as Skyrizi and Rinvoq fuel growth, setting the stage for ABBV stock to hold $250 as a new floor

item.title: Super Micro's Moment of Truth: A Growth Story Under Pressure
item.description: Super Micro's new design wins and key strategic initiatives highlight its central role in the expanding AI infrastructure and data center build-out.

item.title: Palantir Breaks Out: Why PLTR Stock May Rally Into Year-End
item.description: Palantir hits new highs before earnings after major deals with Lumen Technologies and Poland’s defense ministry boost its AI growth story

item.title: MarketBeat Week in Review – 10/27 - 10/31
item.description: Stocks broke trend with a bullish October; for now, investors are prioritizing strong corporate earnings above macroeconomic concerns
